ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class TaskViewHolder<T extends Task>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.TaskViewHolder<T>

  • public class TaskViewHolder<T extends Task>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    TaskViewHolder acts as a cache for task CardViews for us in tandem with an adapter (TaskListAdapter) and a RecyclerView to minimize costly findViewById calls for a potentially large RecyclerView lists of tasks.
    See Also:
    TaskListAdapter, SearchFragment
